From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display the system Health Monitor status information, use the **show health-monitor** command in user EXEC or privileged EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Displays a summary of the status information.

Examples: The following is sample output from show health-monitor command. The fields are self explanatory.
Slot 1 - Empty DFC Not in operation
Slot 2 - Empty DFC Not in operation
Slot 4 - Empty DFC Not in operation
Slot 5 - Empty DFC Not in operation
Slot 6 - Empty DFC Not in operation
Slot 7 - Empty DFC Not in operation
ExtraInfo: Use this command to display the state of the hardware and software subsystem. Health Monitor is a CiscoÂ IOS subsystem that monitors the state of the individual hardware and software subsystems. This monitoring helps in early detection and recovery of faults in the subsystem.
